page.title: 16Upottery School Games 1
page.content: The games we play at school in break- times are mainly of three types, chasing, skipping or ball games but there are others too. {Chasing games.}Tag or It is the basic game where one person is on and he or she tries to catch all the others who avoid being tagged.A number of games are based on this. { {Ball It_}when a ball is used to throw and tag people.{ {Off Ground Tag_ }when players cannot be tagged if they are off the ground (eg.standing on a step). { {Sticky Glue_}where you stand still if you are caught and you can be back in the game if another player releases you by crawling through your legs. Other chasing games involve running between two points such as walls and you may then be caught. One of these games is {British Bulldog. (continued)
